short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sagely's browser extension allows you to save and organize web resources to your Sagely collections for access anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sagely is a personalized social learning platform that grows teams through knowledge-based community building. Sagely's Chrome browser extension allows you to save and organize web resources to your Sagely collections for access anywhere.
